## Description {#details}

Set of metadata that should be preserved when using <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI()</a>.

This provides a more convenient way of preserving <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a>, PCSections and MMRA.

Definition at line 348 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbuilder-h">MachineInstrBuilder.h</a>.
